name: MD5-Blowfish using CUDA in Kernel Space
short_description:
Current GPUs have massive parallelism and a high degree of precision.
With these features, the kernel can use the GPU to perform some of its tasks
which are parallel in nature and require higher precision. For example, cryp-
tographical tasks like encryption and decryption can be done on a GPU than
on a CPU. Due to this, the CPU can perform other tasks, and run some of
its tasks on GPU. In this project, we explore one such case, where the CPU
uses GPU to run hybrid MD5-Blowfish algorithm to encrypt files. The CPU
uses KGPU framework to run the code on GPU.
summary: Running hybrid MD5-Blowfish algorithm using CUDA in kernel space.
